question: A magazine wants to include contribution from its readers for an article called ‘the book that influenced me most’Write a letter to the editor of the magazine about the book that influenced you most. In your letter.Describe what this book was about.Explain how this book influenced you Say whether this book would likely to influence other people
text: I am writing this letter with regards to suggestion on an article named the book that influenced me most. As  I am an avid reader of your weekly magazine on self-development, will be obliged to suggest to you one book which has influenced me a lot. The book name Elon musk: how the billionaire CEO of Tesla and SpaceX is shaping our future.

As the name suggests the book is a biography of one of the richest people on our planet Mr Elon musk. This book describes the struggle and brilliance of Mr Musk and his vision to change the traditional mode of transport. As am an engineer myself, I can relate to advancements in technology and research in which the companies like tesla and SpaceX are involved too.

This book is more than just the chronicle of events that occurred in Mr Musk’s life; it will also motivate the adolescents to work on technologies that will help in the betterment of human life. Moreover, for young ,readers the book has chapters on electric car research done in a company named Tesla which in near future will replace  combustible car engines.
I hope you will consider my recommendation for the article.
